SELECT s.schedule_id as scheduleId, s.user_id as userId, u.user_email as email, u.user_name as userName, s.title as title, s.date as date, s.start_time as start, s.end_time as end, s.type as type, s.is_completed as isCompleted,
s.created_at as createdAt, s.updated_at as updatedAt FROM schedule s JOIN "user" u ON s.user_id = u.user_id WHERE u.user_email = #{userEmail} ORDER BY s.start_time ASC
